name: Autocannon
description: A powerful main gun for shooting holes in most things.

name: Missiles
description: Rocket launcher firing unguided explosive rockets.

name: Machine gun
description: High rate of fire with decent damage. Useful for destroying charges and incoming missiles.

name: Laser
description: Precise and glowing. Useful for destroying charges and aiming more powerful weapons.

name: Crates
description: Drops movable crates. Useful for blocking off areas and annoying other players.

name: Charges
description: Drops exploding crates. Useful for demolition.

name: Homing missiles
description: Rocket launcher firing guided explosive rockets which home in on threats.

name: Timed charges
description: Drops exploding crates which explode after 2 seconds. Useful for mine clearance.

name: Turret
description: Create turrets that shoot at nearby enemies.
